description:
As a Kestrel Engine
  I want to hunt for user management bugs in JSONPlaceholder
  So I can ensure API reliability and data integrity

steps.name: Given  Kestrel API client is armed with credentials
Given  I have prepared new operative data
When  I deploy the operative via POST /users
Then  the deployment should return status 201
And  the response should contain the operative ID
And  the operative data should match input specifications
And  the operative should be retrievable via GET
